org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.api

Interface StatisticsQueryBuilder<R,B extends StatisticsQueryBuilder<R,B>>

  • Type Parameters:
    R - the type for the statistics result
    B - the type for the builder, useful for maintaining type with extensions of this
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    VectorStatisticsQueryBuilder<R>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseStatisticsQueryBuilder, FieldStatisticsQueryBuilder, IndexStatisticsQueryBuilder, PartitionStatisticsQueryBuilder, StatisticsQueryBuilderImpl, VectorStatisticsQueryBuilderImpl

    public interface StatisticsQueryBuilder<R,B extends StatisticsQueryBuilder<R,B>>
    The easiest method to construct an instance of StatisticsQuery.
